Html:
Hi,
First I'd like to thank radioman for this awesome project.
I'd like to ask if it is possible to access the zoom property through a property path, so I can animate the GMapControl zoom.
If yes, what's the path to this property?
thanks!

Found it!! It might come handy to anyone out there who wants to animate his WPF GMapControl Zoom. use the following:
Storyboard.SetTargetProperty(ZoomAnimation, new PropertyPath(GMapControl.ZoomProperty));
Thanks again!
